issue.title: INTEGRATION_world test failure on gazebo_2.1 branch

content.raw:
I've tried adding a destructor and explicitly disconnecting the diffdrive plugin update connection, but it never seems to stop the OnUpdate callback.

I think this bug is a problem in the Event class. It has been fixed in default, but with major refactoring that may be difficult to backport.

Should we just disable this test for the gazebo 2.x branches?
content.html:
I've tried adding a destructor and explicitly disconnecting the diffdrive plugin update connection, but it never seems to stop the OnUpdate callback.

I think this bug is a problem in the Event class. It has been fixed in default, but with major refactoring that may be difficult to backport.

Should we just disable this test for the gazebo 2.x branches?
